verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
1 Father, we love you,
we worship and adore you:
glorify your name
in all the earth.
Glorify your name,
glorify your name,
glorify your name,
in all the earth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
2 Jesus we love you,
we worship and adore you;
glorify your name
in all the earth.
Glorify your name,
glorify your name,
glorify your name
in all the earth.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
3 Spirit, we love you,
we worship and adore you:
glorify your name
in all the earth.
Glorify your name,
glorify your name,
glorify your name,
in all the earth
